title: MPESB Stenographer
description: Madhya Pradesh Employees Selection Board (MPESB) has officially announced the Stenographer Recruitment 2025 on its website. A total of 861 vacancies have been released under this notification. The online application process will commence from 04 February 2025 and will remain open till 18 February 2025. As per the eligibility criteria, the minimum age limit is 18 years, while the maximum age should not exceed 40 years as on 01 January 2024. Interested applicants are advised to carefully go through the complete MPESB Group 4 Recruitment 2025 notification for detailed information.
eligibility: Candidates should generally have passed 10th grade (High School) or 12th grade (Intermediate) from a recognized board.For some posts, a Diploma or Degree in a relevant field may be required.All applicants are advised to thoroughly read the official notification before applying.

title: Bihar BSSC Inter Level Recruitment 2025
description: <b> Bihar Personnel Selection Compensation (BSSC)<b>, has launched a notification on <b>official internet site<b> for the employment of Inter Level Various Post. This employment is for <b>23,175 positions<b>. BSSC Application Form will certainly start with <b>15 October 2025<b> & the candidates can use till the <b>25 November 2025<b>. <b>Minimum age for this is 18 Years & The maximum Age Is 37 Years<b> as on 01 August 2025. Candidates have to check the total information for Bihar BSSC Inter level Recruitment 2025. Link are provided below. <b>(Advt.No. 02/2023 (A)<b>
eligibility: <b>Candidates need to have passed the 12th Class (Intermediate) examination from a recognized board or establishment.
age:
18 years to 37 Years
Maximum Age : 37 Years (UR Male)
Maximum Age : 40 Years (UR Female)
Maximum Age : 40 Years (BC/ EBC Male, Female)
Maximum Age : 42 Years (SC/ ST Male, Female)

title: Bihar STET 2025 online
description: The Bihar College Assessment Board (BSEB) has issued a notification on its website for the Bihar State Teacher Eligibility Test (BSTET/STET 2025). To apply for the STET, visit the official website, find the STET 2025 notification, and follow the instructions to complete and submit the online form. The application opens on September 19, 2025, and closes on October 5, 2025 (Extended). Candidates age must be between 21 and 42 years old as of August 1, 2025, to qualify. Review all required details before submitting the Bihar STET Online Form 2025.
eligibility: For Class 9–10 Teachers which will have Paper-I, candidates must have a Bachelor’s degree in the subject which they applied with at least 50% marks and a B.Ed. degree. For Senior Secondary Teacher , you need a Postgraduate degree in the subject with Second Division with a B.Ed. degree (not required for Computer Science). Candidates belonging to SC/ST/EBC/BC/Divyang categories get 5% relaxation in marks.
age:
21 years to 37 Years for male
max:- 40 Years (Female UR, BC/ EBC-Male & Female)
max:- 42 Years (SC/ ST-Male & Female)
Bihar BSEB provides age relaxation for the Bihar STET position as per their regulations.

title: bihar police asi steno result mark 2024
organization: BPSSC Bihar Police Subordinate Services Commission
description: The Bihar Police Junior Solutions Compensation (BPSSC) has on its official site for the Steno Assistant Below Examiner (ASI) recuitment, which includes 305 jobs. The application procedure occurred from December 17, 2024, to January 17, 2025. The Bihar Authorities exam was provided from April 15 to 17, 2025. To access their marks, candidates can visit to the portal utilizing their enrollment number, registration number, or birthdate.
eligibility: Candidates must have passed Class 12th/HSC from a recognized board.Must have a 1-year Diploma Certificate in Computers.Hindi Stenographer: Speed of 80 words per minute (WPM)Computer Typing: Proficiency in both Hindi and English with a typing speed of 30 WPM,completing 300 words in 10 minutes.Computer Test: Should have good knowledge of MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and the Internet.
age:
Minimum Age : 18 Years
Maximum Age : 25 Years (UR/ EWS)-Male,
Female Maximum Age : 27 Years (BC / EBC)-Male
Maximum Age : 28 Years (BC / EBC)
FemaleMaximum Age : 30 Years (SC/ ST) Male, Female
BPSSC provides age relaxation for the Steno ASI position as per their regulations.

Age Limitation/ Job Details/ Curriculum/ Wage Particulars are Available on Alert/ Promotion.
eligibility: 10th, 10+2, Degree / Diploma (Post Wise) For Post Wise Eligibility Details Read the Notification.

title: RRB NTPC Recruitment 2025
description: Railway Recruitment Board (RRB), has given a short notice on its website for the vacancy of Non-Technical recruitment Popular Categories (NTPC) 10+2 level Post. This recruitment has 3050 vacancies. RRB Application Form filling start date from 28 October 2025 & the candidates can fill form till the 27 November 2025. The Minimum age is 18 Years & The Maximum Age Is 30 Years as on 01 January 2026. Candidates must check notification for the complete details for RRB NTPC 12th level Recruitment 2025 which has given below. (Advt No : CEN 07/2025)
eligibility: Candidates must possess a 10+2 Intermediate Pass from a recognized University/Institute in India.
age:

Maximum Age : 30 Years (Tentative)

title: dsssb admit card 2025
description: Delhi Subordinate Service Selection Commission (DSSSB), The Admit Card has been now available on the official website for the vacancy of DSSSB. The DSSSB Exam date will be from 01 October 2025 - 31 October 2025. Candidates can now download Admit Card by their Enrollment Number which is given in form,also can use Registration Number, and Date of Birth by official website (link given below).

title: Delhi Police Head Constable Ministerial Recruitment 2025
description: Staff Selection Commission (SSC Delhi Police), has given a notification on it's official website for the vacancy of (SSC) Delhi Police Head Constable . This Hiring is for 509 Posts. Delhi Police Form start Date is 29 September 2025 & the Aplicant can apply till 20 October 2025. candidates age must be between 18 and 25 years as on 01 January 2026. SSC provides age relaxation for the Delhi Police Head Constable Aplicant as per their regulations. Candidates must check notification for the complete details for Delhi Police Head Constable Recruitment 2025 which has given below.
qualification: passed 10+2 with typing speed of 30 w.p.m in English or 25 w.p.m in Hindi on computer.
eligibility: passed 10+2 with typing speed of 30 w.p.m in English or 25 w.p.m in Hindi on computer.

18 years to 25 Years
